00016         class DBConn
00017         {
00018                 static $queries_count = 0;
00019                 
00020                 var $link;
00021                 var $query;
00022                 var $result;
00023                 
00028                 function connect()
00029                 {
00030                         if (!is_resource($this->link) || get_resource_type($this->link) != "mysql link")
00031                         {
00032                                 $this->link = mysql_connect(DB_HOST, DB_USER, DB_PASS);
00033                                 mysql_select_db(DB_NAME) or die("Cannot connect: " . mysql_error());
00034                         }
00035                 }
00036                 
00042                 function select_db($database_name)
00043                 {
00044                         $this->connect();
00045                         return mysql_select_db($database_name, $this->link);
00046                 }
00047                 
00052                 function close()
00053                 {
00054                         if (is_resource($this->link) && get_resource_type($this->link) == "mysql link")
00055                         {
00056                                 mysql_close($this->link);
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059                 
00065                 function prepare($query)
00066                 {
00067                         $this->connect();
00068                         
00069                         $args = func_get_args();
00070                         $args_len = func_num_args();
00071                         if ($args_len > 1)
00072                         {
00073                                 for ($i = 1; $i < $args_len; $i++)
00074                                 {
00075                                         $query = preg_replace("/\{$i\}/", mysql_real_escape_string($args[$i], $this->link), $query, 1);
00076                                 }
00077                         }
00078                         $this->query = $query;
00079                         
00080                         if (DB_DEBUG)
00081                         {
00082                                 $this->print_query();
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085                 
00090                 function exec()
00091                 {
00092                         $this->connect();
00093                         $this->result = mysql_query($this->query, $this->link) or die("Error ({$this->query}): " . mysql_error());
00094                         
00095                         self::$queries_count++;
00096                         
00097                         return  $this->result;
00098                 }
00099                 
00104                 function insert_id()
00105                 {
00106                         return mysql_insert_id($this->link());
00107                 }
00108                 
00114                 function escape($value)
00115                 {
00116                         $this->connect();
00117                         return mysql_real_escape_string($value, $this->link);
00118                 }
00119                 
00120                 function result($pos = 0, $name = NULL)
00121                 {
00122                         return mysql_result($this->result, $pos, $name);
00123                 }
00124                 
00128                 function num_rows()
00129                 {
00130                         return mysql_num_rows($this->result);
00131                 }
00132

00137                 {
00138                         return mysql_affected_rows($this->result);
00139                 }
00140                 
00141                 function fetch_assoc()
00142                 {
00143                         return mysql_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00144                 }
00145                 
00146                 function free_result()
00147                 {
00148                         mysql_free_result($this->result);
00149                 }
00150

00152                 {
00153                         echo <<<EOT
00154                         <pre class="db-debug">{$this->query}</pre>
00155 EOT;
00156                 }
